txt.en: Many bands of brigands roam the wilds of Bree-land, waylaying travellers and bullying the inhabitants of Bree and the towns surrounding it. It is up to you to counter the threat the brigands pose to the inhabitants of Bree-land.
Complete the Brigand Slayer - Bree-land Accomplishment.
It is up to you to counter the threat the brigands of Bree-land pose to the inhabitants of the land.
